annotate.login: on form submit we will call login function on lynx.models.AuthModel instance, as a parameters we will provide the local scope values binded to fields
annotate.authentionFailed: we will display the failed message only if authentication fails
annotate.pending: we need to disable buttons and inputs during the authentication progress

username.value: username field value will be binded to local scope variable, and will be used on submit

password.value: password field value will be binded to local scope variable, and will be used on submit
